channel.title: Regex
channel.description: I get flamed everytime I ask a question about aryan updating. Yes I know mopar has the double click updater. But I want to learn the way of old. The one where you have to know regex. Which brings me to my question. Where do I find it and how do I use it and learn it. And updating the defs and such. I got the UPDATER the oliver uses. I'm learning java as fast as I can and am constantly getting better but I need someone that will teach me and not just flame me for my ignorance. I would appreciate it much. If you have paypal I would be happy to donate.

item.title: Regex
item.dc:creator: @Dag Dag
item.description:
@Dag wrote:

Kudos Mopar. I was wondering about the regex thing the most. thanks for the info

Read full topic

item.title: Regex
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

well, you can still use my updater and update the defs yourself, comment out the first 2 wget lines in the .bat file that download the defs from my server and go about it on your own, you can learn regex from http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/extra/regex/index.html and update the regex yourself

Read full topic
